import React from 'react'; import AOS from 'aos'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import FadeIn from 'react-fade-in'; import aboutpic from '../assets/other/aboutprofpic.gif'; import pizza from '../assets/other/pizza.gif'; import makeup from '../assets/other/makeup.jpg'; import denzel from '../assets/other/denzel.jpg'; import pie from '../assets/other/applepie.JPG'; import beach from '../assets/other/beach.JPG'; function AboutPage(props) { AOS.init(); window.scrollTo(0, 0); return (

👋 Hi there! I'm Bryan Ge.

My pronouns are he/him and I’m a sophomore at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I'm studying Information Sciences and graduating in May 2023.

🚙 How did I get into UX and product design?

I've always been intrigued by technological innovations and how they affect our lives. Through learning computer science, I discovered the different roles in product and landed in design. Since my first project, I've been hooked in the creative process of understanding users and problems and constant iteration.

🖋 What am I currently up to?

I'm currently a Product Designer at Hack4Impact and a part-time UX Design Intern at Cargill. At Hack4Impact, I'm also working on design initiatives such as having two designers per project team to foster greater design community and mentorship. This summer, I'll be interning at Apple as a Product Designer!

🥰 Shoutout to my friends, mentors, and design moms!

I've received a ton of support from my friends and members of the design community. Their guidance and mentorship has been incredibly impactful and I am beyond appreciative of them. Thank you Takara Satone and Amanda He for believing in me from the start of my design journey and Jake Brokaw for always being open to chat and give me feedback on my work.

✏️ Experience

Hack4Impact — Product Designer

Spring 2022, Fall 2021

Illinois Labs — Product Designer

Spring 2022, Fall 2021

Cargill — UX Design Intern

Spring 2022, Summer 2021

State Farm — Software Engineer Intern

Fall 2021

Trill Project — Design Intern

Spring 2021

UIUC — Course Assistant, Data Science Discovery

Spring 2021

 🍵 Here's some more about me outside of work!

I love eating pizza with Riya at Jupiter's. 😋

😇 I love playing with different makeup looks!

🎵 Here's the playlist I blast while driving!

I hope to have at least 2 corgis when I'm older, but for now here's a picture of my sister's corgi Denzel. 🥰

Here's the apple pie my sister and I baked for Christmas! 🍎

I love going on photoshoots with Connie. Here's a pic she took in San Diego! 🏝

 ); } export default AboutPage;
